subject: Online Banking Urgent Security Notice
body:
Dear Customer,
Desjardins Online Banking Security Department has been receiving complaints 
		from our customers for unauthorised uses of the Desjardins Online Banking accounts.
		As a result we are temporarily shutting down some selected Desjardins Online Banking 
		Accounts perceived vulnerable to this, pending till the time we carry out
		proper verification by the account owner. Desjardins Online Banking is committed to ensure the safeguard of
		each customer personal information, making sure only authorised individuals 
		have access to their accounts.

As a first step to have Your Desjardins Online Banking Access reactivated please 
            reconfirm your identity by using the link provided below.


https://accesd.desjardins.com/en/accesd/secure/login.html


These instructions are sent to and should be followed by all Desjardins Online Banking 
clients,to avoid service deactivation after the verification is completed.

We apologise for any inconveniences and thank you for your cooperation.



Desjardins Online Security Department
